```{r echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE, results='hide'}

string = reactive({
  hour = as.numeric(format(Sys.time(), "%H"))

  if (hour < 5){
    string = "Hello"
  } else if (hour < 12){
    string = "Good Morning"
  } else if(hour < 17){
    string = "Good Afternoon"
  } else {
    string = "Good Evening"
  }
})

renderText({
  string()
})
```
